params.name: project_json
params.description: The project object to create or update. It is update if the project.id is present, and and create if not.

params.name: project_ids
params.description: Get projects by projectmanager ids. Required if project_code_values or associated_station_ids not given.

params.name: project_code_values
params.description: Get projects by projectmanager project codes. Required if associated_station_ids or associated_station_ids not given.

params.name: associated_station_ids
params.description: Get projects containing stations with provided assetmaster station ids. Required if project_code_values or project_code_values not given.

getStations.description: Return a list of found stations

params.name: include_finished_projects
params.description: if true then finished projects are included with their associated stations, if false then finished projects are not included. If not provided defaults to true.
